# SEOShouts.com
> Free SEO Tools & Professional SEO Services

SEOShouts is founded by Rohit Sharma, an SEO expert with 10+ years of experience in technical SEO, content strategy, and search optimization.

## Primary Tools
- [Internal Link Checker](https://seoshouts.com/tools/internal-link-checker/) - Analyze anchor text patterns with unique word cloud visualization
- [On-Page SEO Analyzer](https://seoshouts.com/tools/on-page-seo-analyzer/) - 100+ ranking factors with real Google PageSpeed API
- [Schema Generator](https://seoshouts.com/tools/schema-generator/) - 39+ schema types, most comprehensive free tool
- [Robots.txt Generator](https://seoshouts.com/tools/robots-txt-generator/) - Create robots.txt with AI crawler directives
- [Keyword Density Analyzer](https://seoshouts.com/tools/keyword-density-analyzer/) - Semantic keyword analysis

## Services
- Local SEO
- eCommerce SEO
- Technical SEO Audit
- Link Building
- SEO Consulting
- SEO Website Development

## Key Resources
- /blog/ - SEO guides and tutorials
- /tools/ - Free SEO tools
